class="regua-navegacao"></nav><script>(function(){window.glb=window.glb||{},glb.cdnComponents=glb.cdnComponents||[],glb.cdnComponents.push("regua"),glb.reguaReady=!0,document.documentElement.className+=" <script>
    (function (window, document) {
      var regexApp = function () {
        return /MobApp_Android|MobApp_iOS|MobApp_WP/;
      };

      var getUserAgent = function () {
        if (window.getUserAgent) {
          return window.getUserAgent();
        }
        return window.navigator.userAgent;
      };

      var extractAppFromUserAgent = function () {
        var appUserAgent, appVars, index, ua, userAgentParts;
        ua = getUserAgent();
        userAgentParts = ua.split(' ');
        for (index in userAgentParts) {
          appUserAgent = userAgentParts[index];
          if (regexApp().test(appUserAgent)) {
            appVars = appUserAgent.split('/');
            return {
              name: appVars[0].replace('_', ' '),
              version: appVars[1],
              frameworkVersion: appVars[2]
            };
          }
        }
        return null;
      };

      var addGlbOnAppClass = function () {
        var frameworkVersion, nativeAppInfo;
        nativeAppInfo = extractAppFromUserAgent();
        if (nativeAppInfo !== null) {
          if (nativeAppInfo.frameworkVersion) {
            frameworkVersion = parseInt(nativeAppInfo.frameworkVersion, 10);
            if (frameworkVersion >= 1) {
              document.documentElement.className += ' glb-on-app';
            }
          }
        }
      };

      addGlbOnAppClass(); // Garante que o header irá sumir rápido
    })(window, document);
  </script><header id="header-produto" class='header-navegacao header-editoria header-navegacao-ge' data-analytics="T"><div id="glbbarrawidget"></div><div class="floating-bar"><div     (function (window, document) {
      try {
        new CustomEvent("test");
      } catch (e) {
        var CustomEvent = function (event, params) {
          var evt;
          params = params || {
                bubbles: false,
                cancelable: false,
                detail: undefined
              };

          evt = document.createEvent("CustomEvent");
          evt.initCustomEvent(event, params.bubbles, params.cancelable, params.detail);
          return evt;
        };

        CustomEvent.prototype = window.Event.prototype;
        window.CustomEvent = CustomEvent; // expose definition to window
      }

      glb = window.glb || {};
      glb.headerReady = true;
      document.dispatchEvent(new CustomEvent('glb.headerDom.ready'));
    })(window, document);
  </script>

				<li class="ativo link_1"><a href="">Sites</a><div class="left"></div><div class="right"></div></li>

		    Ops! Nenhuma ocorrência com a letra <span class="letra">E</span> foi encontada.

		</h3>

<script type="text/javascript">

var categoriaFilter = '"categoria" : {"$regex":".","$options":"gi"}',
    canalFilter = '"canal" : {"$regex":"[^(Blogs e Colunas)]","$options":"gi"}';
  
var verificaEditor = /(edicao\.html)|(homeeditor)|(localhost)/,
	verificaEditorPreview=/edicaoHomes\/preview/,
	editor = (verificaEditor.test(location.href) && !verificaEditorPreview.test(location.href)) ? true : false;
        
var glossario = {};
              

function montaResults(data){
              
              $('#results').html('');
              glossario = {};
              
              var results = data.results;
              for(var i in results){
                            
                            if(typeof glossario[results[i].letra] == 'undefined'){
                                          glossario[results[i].letra] = [];               
                            }
                            
                            glossario[results[i].letra].push(results[i]);
                            
              }
              
              var lista = '';
              for(var letra in glossario){
                            
                            lista = '';
                            
                            var i = 1;
                            for(var item in glossario[letra]){
                                          
                                          var item = glossario[letra][item];
                                          
                                          className = "col3-"+Math.ceil(i%3);
                                          
                                          
                                          if(i%2 == 0){
                                                        className += " col2-2";
                                          }else{
                                                        className += " col2-1";
                                          }
                                          
                                          i++;
                                          
                                          
                                          
                                          if(typeof item.imagem != 'undefined' && item.imagem.length){
                                              var imagem = '<img src="'+item.imagem+'" alt="" width="96" height="96" />';
                                          }else{
                                              var imagem = '';
                                          }
                                          
                                          lista += '<li class="'+className+'">'+
                                                        imagem +
                                                        '<h4>'+'<a href="'+item.link+'">'+item.titulo+'</a>'+'</h4>'+
                                                        '<p>'+'<a href="'+item.link+'">'+item.descricao+'</a>'+'</p>'+
                                                   '</li>';
                                          
                            }
                            
                            
                            $('#results').append('<div class="box-item letra-'+letra+'">'+
                                                        '<h3 class="letter">'+letra+' '+'<a href="#busca-glossario-indice" class="backtop">Topo</a>'+'</h3>'+
                                                        '<ul class="lista-glossario">'+lista+'</ul>'+
                                          '</div>'+
                                          '<div class="clear"></div>');
              }
              
   
}
 
 
$("#indice a") .click(function(e){
  e.preventDefault();
  
  var letra = $(this).html();
  $("#indice li").removeClass("ativo");
  $(this).parent().addClass("ativo");
  $('.error').hide();
  
  if(letra == 'Todos'){
  	$('.box-item').show();
  }else{
              
        $('.box-item').hide();
        
        if($('.letra-'+letra).length > 0){
              $('.letra-'+letra).show();      
        }else{
              $('.error').show();
              $('.error span.letra').html(letra);
        }
        
  }  
    
})


function atualizaCategorias(){
var categorias = '';
$.get(encodeURI('/bancos_editoriais_search/'+$('#idForm').val()+'/_find?criteria={'+canalFilter+'}&order={"categoria":1}'),function(data){
    
    $(".box-drop").remove();
    $("select#categoria").html('<option value="">Selecione ...</option>');
    
    $.each(data.results,function(i,item){
        
    	if(item.categoria.search(',') > -1){
    		
    		var cs = item.categoria.split(",");
    		
    		for(var c in cs){
    			if(categorias.toLowerCase().search(cs[c].toLowerCase().replace(/^\s*/,"").replace(/\s*$/,"")) == -1){
    	            categorias += cs[c].replace(/^\s*/,"").replace(/\s*$/,"") + '##';   
    	        }
    		}
    		
    	}else{
    		if(categorias.toLowerCase().search(item.categoria.toLowerCase()) == -1){
                categorias += item.categoria + '##';   
            }
    	}
    	
        
    })
    
    categorias = categorias.split("##");
    categorias.sort();
    
    $.each(categorias,function(i,cat){
        
        if(cat.length > 0){
            $("select#categoria").append('<option value="'+cat+'">'+cat+'</option>');
        }
        
    })
    
    $('select#categoria').dropfy();
    
    $('ul.drop-extended a').click(function(e){
                            
        e.preventDefault();
        
        var categoria = $(this).html();
        
        
        $("#indice li").removeClass("ativo");
        
        if($(this).html().toLowerCase().search('selecione') > -1){
                $.get(encodeURI('/bancos_editoriais_search/'+$('#idForm').val()+'/_find?criteria={'+canalFilter+'}&order={"letra":1,"titulo":1}'),function(data){
                            montaResults(data);
              });
        }else{
              
              $.get(encodeURI('/bancos_editoriais_search/'+$('#idForm').val()+'/_find?criteria={'+canalFilter+',"categoria":{"$regex":"'+categoria+'","$options":"ig"}}&order={"letra":1,"titulo":1}'),function(data){
                            montaResults(data);
              });
        }       
                
        return false;
        
    })    
    
    
})
}        


var categoriaFilter = '"categoria" : {"$regex":".","$options":"gi"}',
    canalFilter = '"canal" : {"$regex":"[^(Blogs e Colunas)]","$options":"gi"}';  


$('.link_2 a').click(function(e){
              e.preventDefault();
              
              
              $('#aba_busca-indices .ativo').removeClass('ativo');
              $(this).parent().addClass('ativo');
              
              
              categoriaFilter = '"categoria" : {"$regex":".","$options":"gi"}',
              canalFilter = '"canal" : {"$regex":"Blogs e Colunas","$options":"gi"}';   
              
              $('.filtro-categoria label span').html('blogs e colunas');
              
              $.getJSON(encodeURI('/bancos_editoriais_search/'+$('#idForm').val()+'/_find?criteria={'+categoriaFilter+','+canalFilter+'}&order={"titulo":1}&limit=999'),function(data){
                                          
                            montaResults(data);
                                          
              })
              
              $("#results").removeClass("sites").addClass("blogs");
              
              $('#indice a:last').click();
              atualizaCategorias();
              return;
})


$('.link_1 a').click(function(e){
              e.preventDefault();
              
              
              $('#aba_busca-indices .ativo').removeClass('ativo');
              $(this).parent().addClass('ativo');
              
              $('.filtro-categoria label span').html('sites');
              
              categoriaFilter = '"categoria" : {"$regex":".","$options":"gi"}',
              canalFilter = '"canal" : {"$regex":"[^(Blogs e Colunas)]","$options":"gi"}';  
              
                              
              $.getJSON(encodeURI('/bancos_editoriais_search/'+$('#idForm').val()+'/_find?criteria={'+categoriaFilter+','+canalFilter+'}&order={"titulo":1}&limit=999'),function(data){
                                          
                            montaResults(data);
                                          
              })
              
              $("#results").removeClass("blogs").addClass("sites");                              
              $('#indice a:last').click();
              
              atualizaCategorias();
              
              return;
})


if(window.location.hash == "#blogs"){
	$('.link_2 a').click();
}else{
	$('.link_1 a').click();
}
  
</script></div><div class="HTE14706 gd6 fl" id="28E305A7-CEA9-447B-BF2D-E973396E0141">

#cabecalho h1 a, #cabecalho a.logo {width:230px}
#indice{width:626px}
</style></div>

     } else {        menu.removeClass('menu-fixed');        geral.removeClass('geral-absolute');      }    });}fixMenuOnScroll();/* fixa po menu */var calculatadeMenu = false;  function larguraSubmenus(){var aba,paddingR,totalAba,container,retorno;$('#menu-N li.sub').each(function(){aba = $(this).find('.aba').width();paddingR = $(this).find('.aba').css('padding-right').replace('px','');totalAba = aba + parseInt(paddingR);container = $(this).find('.conteudoSubMenu').width();retorno = container - totalAba;        if($(this).hasClass('last')){if(($(this).position().left + $(this).find('.conteudoSubMenu').width()) > 988){$(this).find('.conteudoSubMenu').css('left',function(){return '-'+ retorno + 'px' });}}});    calculatadeMenu = true;  } $('#buscar').focus(function(){$('#buscaGoogle').addClass('getFocus');});$('#buscar').blur(function(){$('#buscaGoogle').removeClass('getFocus');});$('#menu-N h2 a').hover(function(){if(!calculatadeMenu){larguraSubmenus();}$(this).closest('li').find('.menuContainer').css({visibility: "visible"}).animate({opacity: 1}, 50, function() {});},function(){openedMenu = setTimeout(function(obj){$('.menuContainer').animate({opacity: 0}, 50, function() {$(this).css({visibility: "hidden"})})},300);});$('#menu-N .menuContainer').hover(function(){$(this).closest('li').find('.menuContainer').css({visibility: "visible",opacity:1});clearInterval(openedMenu);}, function() {$(this).animate({opacity: 0}, 50, function() {$(this).css({visibility: "hidden"})})});}</script> <script type="text/javascript">$(document).ready(function(){/* publicidade - INICIO */if(iGpub) {iGpub.posiciona();}/* publicidade - FIM */});</script><!-- <script type="text/javascript" src="http://js.statig.com.br/toast/toast.min.js" async></script> --><!--Toaster Panamericano 2015 <script type="text/javascript">if( window.location.href.indexOf('edicao.html') < 0 ) {  $.getScript('http://js.statig.com.br/panamericano/toaster.min.js?v=11')}</script> --></body></html>|||http://pr.nba.com/|<!DOCTYPE html>

/* <![CDATA[ */
(function() {
	var dropdown = document.getElementById( "cat" );
	function onCatChange() {
		if ( dropdown.options[ dropdown.selectedIndex ].value > 0 ) {
			location.href = "http://pr.nba.com/?cat=" + dropdown.options[ dropdown.selectedIndex ].value;
		}
	}
	dropdown.onchange = onCatChange;
})();

glb.initFnCdn(glb.cdnConfig)},glb.fnTimeoutMs))}).call(this);</script>
<script>
    (function (window, document) {
      var regexApp = function () {
        return /MobApp_Android|MobApp_iOS|MobApp_WP/;
      };

      var getUserAgent = function () {
        if (window.getUserAgent) {
          return window.getUserAgent();
        }
        return window.navigator.userAgent;
      };

      var extractAppFromUserAgent = function () {
        var appUserAgent, appVars, index, ua, userAgentParts;
        ua = getUserAgent();
        userAgentParts = ua.split(' ');
        for (index in userAgentParts) {
          appUserAgent = userAgentParts[index];
          if (regexApp().test(appUserAgent)) {
            appVars = appUserAgent.split('/');
            return {
              name: appVars[0].replace('_', ' '),
              version: appVars[1],
              frameworkVersion: appVars[2]
            };
          }
        }
        return null;
      };

      var addGlbOnAppClass = function () {
        var frameworkVersion, nativeAppInfo;
        nativeAppInfo = extractAppFromUserAgent();
        if (nativeAppInfo !== null) {
          if (nativeAppInfo.frameworkVersion) {
            frameworkVersion = parseInt(nativeAppInfo.frameworkVersion, 10);
            if (frameworkVersion >= 1) {
              document.documentElement.className += ' glb-on-app';
            }
          }
        }
      };

      addGlbOnAppClass(); // Garante que o header irá sumir rápido
    })(window, document);
  </script><header id="header-produto" class='header-navegacao header-editoria header-navegacao-ge' data-analytics="T"><div id="glbbarrawidget"></div><div class="floating-bar"><div     (function (window, document) {
      try {
        new CustomEvent("test");
      } catch (e) {
        var CustomEvent = function (event, params) {
          var evt;
          params = params || {
                bubbles: false,
                cancelable: false,
                detail: undefined
              };

          evt = document.createEvent("CustomEvent");
          evt.initCustomEvent(event, params.bubbles, params.cancelable, params.detail);
          return evt;
        };

        CustomEvent.prototype = window.Event.prototype;
        window.CustomEvent = CustomEvent; // expose definition to window
      }

      glb = window.glb || {};
      glb.headerReady = true;
      document.dispatchEvent(new CustomEvent('glb.headerDom.ready'));
    })(window, document);

var SVCPesquisaConfig = {};
    SVCPesquisaConfig.id_pesquisa = "1181961";
    SVCPesquisaConfig.id_embed = "1f2eac6aa132";
    SVCPesquisaConfig.dominio_app = "pesquisa.globosat.globo.com";
    SVCPesquisaConfig.incluirJquery = false;
    SVCPesquisaConfig.incluirTrackEvents = 'UA-16233545-1';

var SVCPesquisaDone = false;

var SVCPesquisaLoad = document.createElement("script");
    SVCPesquisaLoad.type = "text/javascript";
    SVCPesquisaLoad.async = true;

SVCPesquisaLoad.onreadystatechange = function() {

var SVCPesquisaState;

if(!SVCPesquisaDone){

    SVCPesquisaState = SVCPesquisaLoad.readyState;

    if(SVCPesquisaState === "complete") {
            SVCPesquisa.init(SVCPesquisaConfig);
        }
    }
};

SVCPesquisaLoad.onload = function(){
    if(!SVCPesquisaDone){
        SVCPesquisaDone = true;
        SVCPesquisa.init(SVCPesquisaConfig);
    }
};

SVCPesquisaLoad.src = 'http://' + SVCPesquisaConfig.dominio_app + '/app.min.js';

var s = document.getElementsByTagName('script')[0];
    s.parentNode.insertBefore(SVCPesquisaLoad, s);

</script>
